titles: Three speeches spoken in Gvild-Hall concerning His Majesties refusall of a treaty of peace and what is to be done thereupon / two of them spoken by the Lord Brook and one by Sir Henry Vane on Tuesday the 8 of Novem. 1642 ; also votes of the Houses of Parliament made on Munday the 7 of Novem. and read in Guild-hall on Tuesday the 8 of Novem. 1642.
author: Brooke, Robert Greville, Baron, 1607-1643.
Vane, Henry, Sir, 1612?-1662.
publisher: Printed by J. F. for Peter Cole ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Sources.
